settingServerUrlDesc: Backend service URL used to create/manage shares, e.g. https://share.example.com
settingApiTokenDesc: Authentication token for backend API (stored locally only)
settingSiyuanTokenDesc: Authentication token for SiYuan internal API (Settings -> About -> API token)
settingTestConnectionDesc: Test if backend API and SiYuan kernel API work properly
settingDefaultPasswordDesc: Require password when creating a share by default
settingDefaultExpireDesc: Share link will expire after the specified days
settingDefaultPublicDesc: If on, anyone with the link can access (password required if set)
settingS3EnabledDesc: Upload images and attachments to S3-compatible storage for faster access
settingS3PasteUploadDesc: When enabled, paste files will be automatically uploaded to S3 and links will be replaced (requires S3 bucket public access)
settingS3EndpointDesc: S3-compatible service endpoint, e.g. s3.amazonaws.com or self-hosted MinIO
settingS3BucketDesc: Bucket name for storing shared assets
settingS3AccessKeyDesc: S3 access key ID (stored locally only)
settingS3SecretKeyDesc: S3 secret access key (stored locally only)
settingS3CustomDomainDesc: Optional, use custom domain to access assets, e.g. https://cdn.example.com
settingS3PathPrefixDesc: Path prefix for organizing storage objects
settingS3AddressingDesc: Path-style (domain.com/bucket) or Virtual-host style (bucket.domain.com). Self-hosted services like MinIO usually require Path-style.
settingS3ProviderDesc: Select storage provider: AWS S3 or compatible (SigV4), or OSS (HMAC-SHA1)
uploadAssetsFailed: Asset upload failed, using original content
shareDialogRequirePasswordDesc: Visitors must enter password (verified by backend), otherwise public access
shareDialogPasswordKeepPlaceholder: Leave blank to keep current password
shareDialogExpireDaysDesc: Link becomes invalid after the specified days
shareDialogPublicDesc: If off, only authorized users can access
shareDialogSharedHint: This document is already shared. You can copy the link or adjust permissions.
shareDialogPasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 4 characters
shareDialogStopAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to disable all shares?
shareDialogStopAllPartialFail: Some shares could not be disabled. Please try again later.
shareSuccessMessage: Share link generated. You can copy and send it to others:
shareErrorMessage: An error occurred while creating the share:
shareErrorNotConfigured: Please configure Server URL and API Token in plugin settings first
shareErrorSiyuanTokenMissing: Please configure SiYuan Kernel Token in plugin settings first (Settings -> About -> API token)
shareErrorExportFailed: Failed to export document content. Please check if the document is accessible
kramdownApiFailed: Failed to fetch document source. Please check if SiYuan kernel API is available
kramdownParseError: Failed to parse document format. Please check console logs
kramdownTimeout: Document export timeout. Please try again later
assetListViewDesc: View and manage static assets uploaded to S3
assetListDeleteConfirmMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this asset? This will permanently remove the file from S3 storage and cannot be undone.
assetListDeleteFilteredWarning: Warning: This will delete all filtered results
assetListDeleteAllWarning: Warning: This will delete all assets
assetListDeleteFilteredNote: This will permanently remove these files from S3 storage and cannot be undone. Please proceed with caution!
